titles.title: David Chetcuti Firearm Modification Act
To amend title 18, United States Code, to strengthen the ban against assault weapons by restricting the availability of such weapons and certain of their component parts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

bill.summary: 4/15/1999--Introduced. David Chetcuti Firearm Modification Act - Amends the Brady Handgun Violence Prevention Act to: (1) define "firearm" to include a detachable ammunition magazine and specified semiautomatic assault weapon components (thus requiring a background check before transfer by the dealer); and (2) prohibit the sale of a semiautomatic assault weapon, a detachable ammunition magazine, and specified semiautomatic assault weapon components that are otherwise permitted by the Act unless the purchaser appears in person at the business premises of the licensed dealer and the sale is made at the time of such appearance.
